IRational * com::xuggle::xuggler::ContainerParameters::getTimeBase (  )  [virtual]

Get the time base.

For container formats such as webcameras, this is used as the requested frame rate.

Returns:
the time base.

int32_t com::xuggle::xuggler::ContainerParameters::getAudioSampleRate (  )  [virtual]

Get the requested audio sample rate.

For some container formats, such as Alsa Microphones, this is the sample-rate you want the mic to use.

the audio sample rate.

const char * com::xuggle::xuggler::ContainerParameters::getTVStandard (  )  [virtual]

Get the TV Standard.

For some container formats representing television tuners, this is the tv standard they will get data as (e.g. NTSC, PAL, SECAM).

Returns:
the TV standard
